description:

Fixes issue 3303.

messages.text:
LGTM

On Mon, Mar 12, 2012 at 1:24 PM, <rsc@golang.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> log: fix doc comment for Ldate
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5795062/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5795062/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/log/log.go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/log/log.go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/log/log.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/log/log.go
> @@ -27,7 +27,7 @@
>        // order they appear (the order listed here) or the format they
> present (as
>        // described in the comments).  A colon appears after these items:
>        //      2009/0123 01:23:23.123123 /a/b/c/d.go:23: message
> -       Ldate         = 1 << iota     // the date: 2009/0123
> +       Ldate         = 1 << iota     // the date: 2009/01/23
>        Ltime                         // the time: 01:23:23
>        Lmicroseconds                 // microsecond resolution:
> 01:23:23.123123.  assumes Ltime.
>        Llongfile                     // full file name and line number:
> /a/b/c/d.go:23
>
>
>

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
